FuncDef: This command configures TTL security parameters for incoming packets. When the feature is enabled, BGP/LDP will accept incoming IP packets from a peer only if the TTL value in the packet is greater than or equal to the minimum TTL value configured for that peer. Peer address has to be the TCP session transport address.

ParaDef.Info: Specify the minimum TTL value for an incoming packet. Values-1 to 255.
